**[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 45 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 43 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 40 [Korog](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2337) **Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 403 **Perception** +29; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12) **Languages** [Hallit](/Languages.aspx?ID=37) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +29, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +33, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +30, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +29, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +29 **Str** +8 **Dex** +5 **Con** +4 **Int** +2 **Wis** +5 **Cha** +4 **Items** _[+2 resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=147) [full plate](/Armor.aspx?ID=13)_, _+2 [greater shock](/Equipment.aspx?ID=303) [maul](/Weapons.aspx?ID=33)_ --- **AC** 39 **Fort** +30 **Ref** +27 **Will** +27 **HP** 295 ([negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42), rejuvenation) **Immunities** death effects, disease, electricity, paralyzed, poison, precision, and unconscious **Sacrilegious Aura** ([abjuration](/Traits.aspx?ID=2), [aura](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=5), [divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [evil](/Traits.aspx?ID=64)) 30 feet. When a creature in the aura uses a [positive](/Traits.aspx?ID=128) spell or ability, the graveknight automatically attempts to counteract it, with a +26 counteract modifier.
**[Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)** --- **Speed** 25 feet **Melee** _greater shock maul_ +30 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Shove](/Traits.aspx?ID=193)), **Damage** 3d12+17 bludgeoning plus 1d6 electricity **Designate Blood-Foe** Korog declares one creature he can see within 30 feet to be his blood- foe whom he swears to defeat. He can have up to three blood-foes designated at a time; any additional blood- foe removes another blood-foe of Korog's choice. Korog treats the results of Perception checks made against blood-foes as improved by one degree, and he has a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against his blood-foes' attacks. **Devastating Blast** The graveknight unleashes a 30-foot cone of energy. Creatures in the area take 9d12 electricity damage (DC 37 basic Reflex save). The graveknight can use this ability once every 1d4 rounds. **Graveknight's Curse** This curse affects anyone who wears a graveknight's armor for at least 1 hour. **Saving Throw** DC 37 Will save; **Onset** 1 hour; **Stage 1** [doomed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=9) 1 and cannot remove the armor (1 day); **Stage 2** doomed 2, hampered 10, and cannot remove the armor (1 day); **Stage 3** dies and transforms into the armor's graveknight. **Korog's Command** **Frequency** once per round; **Effect** Korog commands his allies to take an action. All allies who hear or see him are [quickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=32) 1 for 1 round and can use this extra action to Step, Stride, or make a Strike against one of Korog's blood-foes. **Weapon Master** The graveknight has access to the critical specialization effects of any weapons it wields.
